併入.definition: to merge into; to incorporate in

併吞.definition: to swallow up; to annex; to merge

併攏.definition: to draw together; to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)

併發.definition: to happen simultaneously; (medicine) (of one disease) to be complicated by (another); (of another disease) to erupt simultaneously; (computing) concurrent

併系群.definition: variant of 並系群|并系群[bing4 xi4 qun2]

併紗.definition: doubling (combining two or more lengths of yarn into a single thread)

併購.definition: merger and acquisition (M and A); acquisition; to take over
